calculations.FormulaCognos:
substring(rpad([PRIMARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 1,2) + ' ' +
substring(rpad([PRIMARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 3,2) + ' ' +
substring(rpad([PRIMARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 5,2) + ' ' +
substring(rpad([PRIMARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 7,2) + ' ' +
substring(rpad([PRIMARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 9,2) + ' ' +
substring(rpad([PRIMARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 11,2)
calculations.FormulaDax: LEFT(RIGHT(REPT(" ", 12) & 'MaterialInquiryDetail_UC012'[PRIMARY_LOC], 12), 2) & " " & MID(RIGHT(REPT(" ", 12) & 'MaterialInquiryDetail_UC012'[PRIMARY_LOC], 12), 3, 2) & " " & MID(RIGHT(REPT(" ", 12) & 'MaterialInquiryDetail_UC012'[PRIMARY_LOC], 12), 5, 2) & " " & MID(RIGHT(REPT(" ", 12) & 'MaterialInquiryDetail_UC012'[PRIMARY_LOC], 12), 7, 2) & " " & MID(RIGHT(REPT(" ", 12) & 'MaterialInquiryDetail_UC012'[PRIMARY_LOC], 12), 9, 2) & " " & MID(RIGHT(REPT(" ", 12) & 'MaterialInquiryDetail_UC012'[PRIMARY_LOC], 12), 11, 2)

calculations.FormulaCognos:
substring(rpad([SECONDARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 1,2) + ' ' +
substring(rpad([SECONDARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 3,2) + ' ' +
substring(rpad([SECONDARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 5,2) + ' ' +
substring(rpad([SECONDARY_LOC], 12, ' '), 7,2) + ' ' +

calculations.FormulaDax: CONCATENATE(CONCATENATE(CONCATENATE(CONCATENATE(CONCATENATE(MID(RIGHT('MaterialInquiryDetail_UC012'[SECONDARY_LOC] & REPT(" ", 12), 12), 1, 2) & " ", MID(RIGHT('MaterialInquiryDetail_UC012'[SECONDARY_LOC] & REPT(" ", 12), 12), 3, 2) & " "), MID(RIGHT('MaterialInquiryDetail_UC012'[SECONDARY_LOC] & REPT(" ", 12), 12), 5, 2) & " "), MID(RIGHT('MaterialInquiryDetail_UC012'[SECONDARY_LOC] & REPT(" ", 12), 12), 7, 2) & " "), MID(RIGHT('MaterialInquiryDetail_UC012'[SECONDARY_LOC] & REPT(" ", 12), 12), 9, 2) & " "), MID(RIGHT('MaterialInquiryDetail_UC012'[SECONDARY_LOC] & REPT(" ", 12), 12), 11, 2))
